itemDescription: Shaykh in the  Chishti Nizami Sufi Order

wikipedia_page.main:
Muhammad Imdad Hussain Pirzada, (Arabic: شیخ محمد امداد حسین بیرزادہ) (born 12 April 1946) in Jhang, Pakistan, is a shaykh in the  Chishti Nizami Sufi Order and author of devotional books on Islam.
He is a graduate of DMG Bhera and the University of the Punjab (Pakistan). His qualifications include Adib, ‘Alim and Fadil ‘Arabi, BA (English), MA (Islamic Studies), MA (Arabic) and MOL.
Muhammad Imdad Hussain Pirzada is a shaykh in the  Chishti Nizami Sufi Order given ijaza by his shaykh, spiritual mentor and teacher, Diya’ al-Ummat, Justice Shaykh Muhammad Karam Shah al-Azhari. He was also granted ijaza in the Qadiri Sufi Order and was awarded with the direct ijaza in the  Chishti Sufi Order coming from the astana of Mu’in ad-Din of Ajmer.MAN SABA NABIYANN
